Package autumn.lang.compiler.ast.commons

Interface IOperation

All Superinterfaces:
IConstruct, IExpression
All Known Subinterfaces:
IBinaryOperation, IConversionOperation, IUnaryOperation
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddOperation, AndOperation, AsOperation, ConcatOperation, DivideOperation, EqualsOperation, GreaterThanOperation, GreaterThanOrEqualsOperation, IdentityEqualsOperation, IdentityNotEqualsOperation, ImpliesOperation, IsOperation, LessThanOperation, LessThanOrEqualsOperation, ModuloOperation, MultiplyOperation, NegateOperation, NotEqualsOperation, NotOperation, NullCoalescingOperation, OrOperation, SubtractOperation, XorOperation
public interface IOperation extends IExpression
An instance of this interface is an AST node that is an operator-based operation.
Author:
Mackenzie High
